currentIssues.description: Chord symbols (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) have poor color contrast against dark background
currentIssues.location: Orange/yellow chord symbols throughout the display

currentIssues.description: Lyrics and chords compete for attention with similar visual weight
Inconsistent text sizing and unclear hierarchy between song title, lyrics, and chords
currentIssues.location: Song title 'The Beatles' and main content area

currentIssues.description: Irregular spacing between chord symbols and corresponding lyrics
No visible scrolling controls or progress indicators for navigation

recommendations.title: Implement responsive stage-ready font sizing
recommendations.description: Use larger, bolder fonts optimized for stage viewing distances with clear hierarchy
recommendations.code:
className='text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl leading-relaxed font-semibold' // lyrics
className='text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold' // chords

recommendations.title: Improve chord contrast with background highlighting
recommendations.description: Add semi-transparent background boxes behind chord symbols with proper contrast ratios
recommendations.code: className='bg-gray-800/90 px-2 py-1 rounded text-yellow-300 font-bold'

recommendations.title: Separate chord and lyric layers visually
recommendations.description: Create distinct visual lanes for chords above lyrics with subtle background separation
recommendations.code:
className='chord-lane bg-gray-900/50 py-2' // for chord row
className='lyric-lane text-2xl font-medium text-white' // for lyrics

recommendations.title: Implement chord alignment grid system
recommendations.description: Use CSS grid to ensure chords align perfectly above their corresponding syllables
recommendations.code:
className='grid grid-cols-[repeat(auto-fit,minmax(3ch,1fr))] gap-1' // for chord row
className='col-start-[var(--chord-position)]' // for individual chords

recommendations.title: Add floating progress bar with section markers
recommendations.description: Include a minimal progress bar showing current position and upcoming sections
recommendations.code:
className='fixed bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-3/4 h-2 bg-gray-700 rounded-full'
// with markers: className='absolute h-4 w-1 bg-white/80 -top-1'
